code: import{FETCH_CANCEL_REASONS,FETCH_CANCEL_REASONS_SUCCESS,FETCH_CANCEL_REASONS_FAILED,EDIT_CANCELLATION_REASON}from"../store/types";import{firebase}from'../config/configureFirebase';import store from'../store/store';import{onValue,set}from"firebase/database";export var fetchCancelReasons=function fetchCancelReasons(){return function(dispatch){var cancelreasonRef=firebase.cancelreasonRef;dispatch({type:FETCH_CANCEL_REASONS,payload:null});onValue(cancelreasonRef,function(snapshot){if(snapshot.val()){var data=snapshot.val();var arr=[];for(var i=0;i<data.length;i++){arr.push(data[i].label);}dispatch({type:FETCH_CANCEL_REASONS_SUCCESS,payload:{simple:arr,complex:snapshot.val()}});}else{dispatch({type:FETCH_CANCEL_REASONS_FAILED,payload:store.getState().languagedata.defaultLanguage.no_cancel_reason});}});};};export var editCancellationReason=function editCancellationReason(reasons,method){return function(dispatch){var cancelreasonRef=firebase.cancelreasonRef;dispatch({type:EDIT_CANCELLATION_REASON,payload:method});set(cancelreasonRef,reasons);};};
